p: E. cinerea exclusively grows in the Central Zagros Mountains in the Province of Lorestan and Chaharmahal va Bakhtiari.[ 7] In Bakhtiari, it grows in Se Gaveh Tangeh Mahmoud, Tangeh Nagou, Sefid Dasht, Sefid Kouh, Fars, Mount Dena, Sabzkouh: Darreh Bazoft, Mount Kino, near Lebed: Naghan and Chahartagh.[ 18 19]
